content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
### Iron Smelting Facility at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0)
Consists of:
– Furnace at Position(x=5.0, y=5.0)

Use-case: Converts iron ore into iron plates to support downstream production.

### Copper Smelting Facility at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)
Consists of:
– Furnace at Position(x=-27.0, y=-60.0)

Use-case: Converts copper ore into copper plates to alleviate resource shortages for further production.

(No Lab structure is present on the map as all attempts to place or craft one were unsuccessful.)

ERROR TIPS
──────────
– Incorrect get_entities usage:
 • Ensure that the API call matches the expected signature. Avoid passing a keyword (such as “radius”) or extra positional arguments if none are expected.

– Lab placement failures:
 • Verify that a lab is available in the inventory before attempting placement.
 • Double-check the parameters when calling functions to place a structure.

– NoneType iteration error:
 • Confirm that functions used for entity retrieval return an iterable (or fall back to an empty list) before processing the result.

– Lab crafting resource deficits:
 • Confirm that all required sub-ingredients (for example, iron-gear-wheels, electronic circuits, and copper cables) are sufficiently available.
 • Resolve any supply chain bottlenecks (such as by properly increasing smelted iron and copper stocks) before reattempting lab crafting.
